mapper.select: SELECT cu.customer_seq AS customerSeq, cu.customer_name AS customerName, c.branch_name AS branchName, c.representative_name AS representativeName, p.receipt_id AS receiptId, p.pg AS pg, p.method AS method, p.price AS price, p.purchased_at AS purchasedAt, p.card_company AS cardCompany, p.card_num AS cardNum, p.del AS del, p.receipt_url AS receiptUrl FROM Payment p JOIN Convenience c ON p.conv_seq = c.conv_seq JOIN Customer cu ON cu.customer_seq = p.user_seq WHERE p.receipt_id = #{receiptId}

SELECT cu.customer_seq AS customerSeq, cu.customer_name AS customerName, c.branch_name AS branchName, c.representative_name AS representativeName, p.receipt_id AS receiptId, p.pg AS pg, p.method AS method, p.price AS price, p.purchased_at AS purchasedAt, p.card_company AS cardCompany, p.card_num AS cardNum, p.del AS del, p.receipt_url AS receiptUrl FROM Payment p JOIN Convenience c ON p.conv_seq = c.conv_seq JOIN Customer cu ON cu.customer_seq = p.user_seq WHERE p.receipt_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{receiptId}, '%') ORDER BY p.purchased_at DESC;
